;(Talk to Chevreuse)

===Guest Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Chevreuse)
:{{A|vo card chevreuse freetalk 01.ogg}} '''Chevreuse:''' These card games are quite popular in the Special Patrol. A lot of my colleagues like to buy and trade them... I won't stop my team from engaging in a sensible level of recreational activity, but I do warn them to play in moderation.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::{{A|vo card chevreuse leave 01.ogg}} '''Chevreuse:''' Goodbye. I'll be back on shift shortly. I'm sure a lot of work has already piled up while I've been gone...

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card chevreuse endofgame win 01.ogg}} '''Chevreuse:''' I can't take credit for that win &mdash; I just got lucky. It could have gone either way.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card chevreuse endofgame fail 01.ogg}} '''Chevreuse:''' ...Yeah, I'm no good at games like this. Ah... And it looks like my break time is about over.
{{Dialogue End}}
